categories: Category:Outer Rim Territories planets on the Hydian Way

nodes.text: Simpla-12 was a neglected, underdeveloped planet, strip-mined and criminal-infested. Jenna Zan Arbor had a lab on the planet surface, and performed her twisted experiments on unfortunate Jedi there. The thieves Cholly, Weez, and Tup lived there, as well as the bounty hunter Ona Nobis.
